credit_line: Gift of George W. George, Class of 1941
title: A Neighborly Visit
inscriptions: l.c. in ink: A neighborly visit - by Rube Goldberg; l.r. in ink: Tues Sept.[crossed out with July written over] 28; u.r. in blue pencil: 13 3/4; l.c. in image: [McNaught Syndicate sticker crossed out]; l.c. in image in ink: RLGOLDBERG; verso l.l. in pencil: 9[encircled]; verso l.r. in pencil: 24[encircled]
